summary: Comprehensive testing of FixItNow Marketplace Customer app completed successfully. Backend APIs are 100% functional (13/13 tests passed) with all customer features working correctly. Frontend UI is fully functional with successful registration, login, dashboard, job posting, professional browsing, and navigation. The customer workflow including registration, authentication, job posting, browsing professionals, viewing quotes, and messaging is working as expected.

design_issues.issue: Messages button not visible in main header navigation
design_issues.note: Messaging functionality works via backend API, just navigation button missing from header

passed_tests: Customer Registration - Successfully creates new customer accounts with proper validation
Customer Login - Authentication working with proper error handling and session management
Customer Dashboard - Displays personalized welcome, live stats, job management, and action cards
Post Job - Complete job posting workflow with title, description, category, location, budget
Browse Professionals - Professional search with filters, ratings, verification badges, pricing
Job Management - View posted jobs, job details, and quote counts
Quote Viewing - View quotes from professionals with pricing and details
Professional Profiles - View pro details, ratings, experience, and portfolio information
Messaging System - Customer-Pro communication working via backend API
Quote Management - Accept/reject quotes functionality working
Service Categories - All 10 categories loading correctly (handyman, plumbing, electrical, etc.)
Navigation - All customer app routes functional (dashboard, post-job, browse-pros)
Backend API Integration - All 13 customer endpoints working correctly
Error Handling - Proper validation and error messages for invalid inputs
Session Management - Login/logout functionality working correctly
UI/UX Design - Professional, responsive design with FixItNow branding

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (All core UI features working, minor navigation issue)
